chapter.title: Changes for &PRODUCT; Users
chapter.para: &PRODUCT; Users are people who use the &PRODUCT; application on a regular basis for the purposes of maintaining a functional network. Users make use of the Web UI, and notifications, and are mostly data focused in their tasks.

section.title: Changes since &LASTPRODVER;
section.para: The following changes for &PRODUCT; Users have have gone into effect since &PRODUCT; &LASTPRODVER;

varlistentry.term: Bug Fix: Font Reference for Early Morning Report

listitem.para: References to Calibri and Helvetica Neue were changed to SansSerif. This caused the Early Morning Report to fail to run in some environments. Bug: 4059.

varlistentry.term: Bug Fix: White Lines Removed from Charts

listitem.para: The component that rendered the Charts in the Chart section of the UI was displaying a white line down the center of the bar charts. This was introduced with the upgrade of the JFreeChart component, and the configuration has now been set to default to the old behavior without the white line. Bug: 3976.
